00014 #ifndef TEXTITERATOR_H
00015 #define TEXTITERATOR_H

00017 #include "config.h"

00020 class isoTextIterator {
00021   public:
00022 
00027    isoTextIterator(const char* isostr) {
00028       m_str = isostr;
00029       m_pos = 0;
00030       m_maxLen = MAX_UINT32;
00031    }
00032    
00037    isoTextIterator(const char* isostr, int maxlen ) {
00038       m_str = isostr;
00039       m_pos = 0;
00040       m_maxLen = maxlen;
00041    }
00042    
00047    isoTextIterator(const MC2String& str ) {
00048       m_str    = str.c_str();
00049       m_maxLen = str.size();
00050       m_pos    = 0;
00051    }
00052    
00053    const isoTextIterator& operator++() {
00054       ++m_pos;
00055       return *this;
00056    }
00057 
00058    int nbrBytesForCurrentChar() const {
00059       return 1;
00060    }
00061    
00062    const uint32 operator*() const {
00063       if ( m_pos < m_maxLen ) {
00064          return uint32(uint8(m_str[m_pos]));
00065       } else {
00066          return 0;
00067       }
00068    }
00069    
00070   private:
00071    // The string to be iterated
00072    const char* m_str;
00073 
00074    // The current position
00075    unsigned int m_pos;
00076    // Maximum lenght
00077    uint32 m_maxLen;   
00078 };

00080 
00081 class utf8TextIterator {
00082   public:
00083 
00088    utf8TextIterator(const char* utf8str) {
00089       m_str    = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>( utf8str );
00090       m_pos    = 0;
00091       m_maxLen = MAX_UINT32;
00092    }
00093    
00099    utf8TextIterator(const char* utf8str, int maxlen ) {
00100       m_str    = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>( utf8str );
00101       m_pos    = 0;
00102       m_maxLen = maxlen;
00103    }
00104    
00109    utf8TextIterator(const MC2String& str ) {
00110       m_str    = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>( str.c_str() );
00111       m_maxLen = str.size();
00112       m_pos    = 0;
00113    }
00114 
00115    static int nbrBytesForUtf8Char( const unsigned char* str, int pos ) {
00116       register unsigned char c = str[ pos ];
00117       int nbrBytes = 1;
00118       if ( c <= 127 )
00119          nbrBytes = 1;
00120       else if( (c >= 192) && (c <= 223) )
00121          nbrBytes = 2;
00122       else if( (c >= 224) && (c <= 239) )
00123          nbrBytes = 3;
00124       else if( (c >= 240) && (c <= 247) )
00125          nbrBytes = 4;
00126       else if( (c >= 248) && (c <= 251) )
00127          nbrBytes = 5;
00128       else if( (c >= 252) && (c <= 253) )
00129          nbrBytes = 6;
00130       return nbrBytes;
00131    }
00132    
00133    static int nbrBytesForUtf8Char( const char* str, int pos ) {
00134       return nbrBytesForUtf8Char( 
00135          reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*> ( str ), pos );
00136    }
00137    
00138    int nbrBytesForCurrentChar() const {
00139       return nbrBytesForUtf8Char(m_str, m_pos);
00140    }
00141    
00142    const utf8TextIterator& operator++() {
00143       m_pos += nbrBytesForUtf8Char( m_str, m_pos );
00144       return *this;
00145    }
00146 
00150    bool operator!=( const utf8TextIterator& other ) const {
00151       return ( ( m_str + m_pos ) != ( other.m_str + other.m_pos ) );
00152    }
00153 
00157    bool operator==( const utf8TextIterator& other ) const {
00158       return !(*this != other);
00159    }
00160       
00161    const uint32 operator*() const {
00162       uint32 nbrBytes = nbrBytesForUtf8Char( m_str, m_pos );
00163 
00164       if ( m_pos + nbrBytes > m_maxLen ) {
00165          // Return end of string.
00166          return 0;
00167       }
00168 
00169       if ( nbrBytes == 1 ) {
00170          return  uint32( m_str[m_pos] );
00171       } else if ( nbrBytes == 2 ) {
00172          return  uint32( ((m_str[m_pos]  -0xC0)<<6) + 
00173                          ( m_str[m_pos+1] -0x80) );
00174       } else {
00175          return handleMoreBytes( nbrBytes );
00176       }
00177    }
00178 
00179   private:
00180 
00182    uint32 handleMoreBytes( int nbrBytes ) const;
00183    
00184    // The string to be iterated
00185    const unsigned char* m_str;
00186 
00187    // The current position
00188    unsigned int m_pos;
00189    
00190    // Maximum lenght
00191    uint32 m_maxLen;   
00192 };
00193 
00194 // Creates a utf8 or iso text iterator
00195 #ifdef MC2_UTF8
00196 typedef utf8TextIterator mc2TextIterator;
00197 #else
00198 typedef isoTextIterator mc2TextIterator;
00199 #endif

00201 #endif
